AI Description: Wtdbg is a bioinformatics software tool designed for the assembly, comparison, and analysis of long-read sequencing data. It is optimized for dealing with noisy and error-prone reads commonly produced by technologies like PacBio and Oxford Nanopore.
Core Features: De Novo Assembly Of Long-Read Sequencing Data, Error Correction & Consensus Sequence Generation, Visualization Of Assembly Graphs & Genomes, Comparative Analysis Of Genomic Data
